Direct Known Subclasses:
AeJSStringFormatterTag, AePropertyDateFormatterTag, AePropertyNumberFormatterTag, AeXMLStringFormatterTag
public abstract class AeAbstractPropertyFormatterTag
extends AeAbstractBeanPropertyTag

Base class for date and number formatting tags.

getFormattedText

protected abstract java.lang.String getFormattedText()
                                              throws AeException,
                                                     javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Returns the formatted text to be displayed. Subclasses must implement this method and return the formatted text to be displayed (written out to the pageContext).

Returns:
text to be displayed.
Throws:
AeException - if error occur during text formatting.
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException

getResolvedPattern

protected java.lang.String getResolvedPattern()
                                       throws AeException
Returns the format pattern. This method checks the 'pattern' attribute first. If there is no value specified in 'pattern', then it uses the key specified in based on the resource bundle is returned, otherwise, the literal set in the tag is returned.

Returns:
format pattern literal set in the tag, or the pattern found in the resource bundle.
Throws:
AeException - if pattern is not found in the resource bundle.

getResolvedFormatter

protected java.text.Format getResolvedFormatter()
                                         throws AeException
Gets the Format object from the pageContext, creating it if it doesn't exist based on the resolved pattern. The Format object is the base class of Number and DataFormat objects. Subclasses must cast this to its appropriate type before using.

Returns:
the Format object based on the current pattern.
Throws:
AeException - if unable to create and return the propert formatter.

createFormatter

protected abstract java.text.Format createFormatter(java.lang.String aPattern)
                                             throws AeException
Abstract factory method that returns the concrete Format object. Subclass must create and return the proper Format object such as java.text.DateFormat.

Parameters:
aPattern -
Returns:
Concrete Format object.
Throws:
AeException - if unable to create and return a Formatter object.
